messages.coldMessage:
Hi Peilin,

My name is John Smith, a senior at USC studying [mention John's major if known, otherwise remove]. I noticed you also attended USC for your Master's in Computer Science – Fight On! I'm deeply interested in software engineering, particularly at Google, and I'm exploring internship opportunities. Would you be open to a brief 15-minute chat about your experience at Google and any advice you might have for someone looking to break into the field?

Thanks for your time and consideration.

Best,

John Smith
messages.headline: Software Engineer at Google

messages.coldMessage:
Hi Travis,

As a fellow Trojan and current senior at USC involved in Robotics Club and AI Society, I came across your profile and was impressed by your work as a Software Engineer at Google. I'm also based in Los Angeles, and with graduation approaching, I'm actively seeking internship opportunities in software engineering at Google. Would you be open to a brief 15-minute chat sometime in the next week to discuss your experiences at Google and any advice you might have for someone looking to break in? Thanks for your time and consideration.

Best,

John Smith
messages.headline: Software Engineer at Google

messages.coldMessage:
Hi Thomas,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm John Smith, a senior at USC, deeply involved in Robotics Club and AI Society. As a fellow Trojan and aspiring software engineer, I was excited to see you're at Google in LA and a USC alum! I'm currently exploring internship opportunities in software engineering for next summer and would love to learn more about your experience at Google. Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call sometime in the next few weeks?

Thanks for your time and consideration.
Best regards,
John Smith
